argument.description: The positive number to take the square root of.

description: The PostgreSQL sqrt function returns the square root of a number.
sample:
postgres=# SELECT sqrt(25);
 sqrt
------
    5
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT sqrt(26);
       sqrt
------------------
 5.09901951359278
(1 row)

postgres=# SELECT sqrt(0);
 sqrt
------
    0
(1 row)
